name: Fojo
description:
Fojo is a videogame based on the youtube animation "Alight" posted by VFX Apprentice.

The story about Fojo,  our fire like character,  in an adventure where he has to rescue his water made friend Waterfall from being used by the evil tinted villain Tinka has fuel to a giant robot. The Tinkas aim to cover the world in ink consuming everything and Fojo has to stop them!

Controls:

Right Arrow - Right Jump
Left Arrow -  Left Jump
ESC - Pause
Mouse - Select Options in the Menu

Disclaimer:

Fojo is currently considered finished despite it's existing bugs. With it's due interest i may or may not continue the project and fix it. Thank you!
